clue: I keep you warm both night and day, but I never have a word to say. What am I?

hints.text: I’m soft and cozy to the touch
You pull me close when it’s cold
I’m found on your bed when you sleep

clue: I swim the seas with arms of eight, moving in ways that fascinate. What am I?

hints.text: I live deep under the sea
I have many arms but no bones
I’m known for squirting ink to escape

clue: I rise with air and float so high, drifting softly through the sky. What am I?

hints.text: I’m filled with air or gas
Kids love me at parties
If you pop me, I go ‘bang!’

clue: I’m found in tales both bright and rare, with one long horn beyond compare. What am I?

hints.text: I’m a creature of magic
I look like a horse with something extra
I have a single horn on my head

clue: I capture moments that stand still, colors and faces, at your will. What am I?

hints.text: I can hang on walls
I show people, places, or things
I’m what a camera helps you make

clue: I guide young minds both day and night, helping them learn to read and write. What am I?

hints.text: I work in a classroom
I help students understand new things
I’m the one who teaches you at school

clue: I come once in a while, a break from the race, where fun and rest both have a place. What am I?

hints.text: I’m a special time to relax
You might travel or celebrate during me
I’m when there’s no school or work

clue: I can be short, I can be long, I take you places where you belong. What am I?

hints.text: I involve moving from one place to another
I can happen by car, train, or plane
I’m another word for a trip or travel

clue: I stand tall with smoke in the air, guiding it out without a care. What am I?

hints.text: I sit on top of houses
I let something escape upward
Santa uses me to come inside!

clue: I pop and crackle, light as air, a tasty treat beyond compare. What am I?

hints.text: I start small and become fluffy
I’m often eaten during movies
I’m made by heating up corn kernels

clue: I echo cheers both loud and clear, where players run and crowds can cheer. What am I?

hints.text: I’m a very large place
People gather here to watch games
I’m where football or concerts take place

clue: I help you see what’s far or near, resting gently upon your ear. What am I?

hints.text: I come in pairs and sit on your nose
I make blurry things look clear
You wear me to help your eyes see better

clue: I’m leafy, green, and full of might, good for health but not a bite’s delight. What am I?

hints.text: I’m a green vegetable
I’m full of vitamins and iron
I’m what made Popeye strong

clue: I seek to know and test and learn, through questions asked at every turn. What am I?

hints.text: I’m about studying the world around us
I use experiments to find answers
I’m a school subject about nature, energy, and life

clue: I’m full of smells and tasty sights, where meals are made for days and nights. What am I?

hints.text: I’m a busy room in the house
You use me to cook food
I’m where the oven and fridge stay

clue: I’m full of sand, a place to play, where castles rise in a happy way. What am I?

hints.text: Kids like to dig and build in me
I’m often found in playgrounds
I’m a box full of sand for children to play in

clue: I roll on fields both wide and green, strong and loud, a farmer’s machine. What am I?

hints.text: I’m big, heavy, and move on farms
I pull things through soil
Farmers use me to plow fields

clue: I waddle around, dressed in black and white, I love the cold and can’t take flight. What am I?

hints.text: I’m a bird that cannot fly
I live where it’s icy and cold
I slide on my belly across the snow

clue: I make a sound both sharp and clear, a little note for all to hear. What am I?

hints.text: I’m small but can be loud
You use air to make me sing
Referees and lifeguards often use me

clue: I shine a light when it’s dark around, guiding your steps without a sound. What am I?

hints.text: I’m used when it’s dark outside
I can be carried by hand
I’m a portable light often used for camping

clue: I hide under beds or in dreams at night, sometimes scary, sometimes polite. What am I?

hints.text: I’m often in stories or movies
Kids sometimes think I live under the bed
I’m a make-believe creature that can be scary or funny

clue: I swing between two trees with ease, perfect for naps in a gentle breeze. What am I?

hints.text: I’m made of fabric and rope
I hang between two poles or trees
People rest or nap in me outdoors

clue: I’m small and soft, a safe little space, where babies rest in a cozy place. What am I?

hints.text: I’m used for little kids
I keep babies safe while they play
I’m like a small fenced area for toddlers

clue: I sparkle bright and love to swing, from ears I hang like a shiny thing. What am I?

hints.text: I’m a small piece of jewelry
I usually come in pairs
I hang from your ears to look pretty

clue: I follow you wherever you go, carrying your things to and fro. What am I?

hints.text: I’m used when people travel
I carry clothes and other items
I’m another word for luggage
